SEARCH:
Package game

Klasse GameState

java.lang.Object
game.GameState
public class GameState extends Object
Represents a game and its state. An instance of this class represents a single game, consisting of several rounds and tricks.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    GameState()
    Constructs a new game state with default values.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • GameState

      public GameState()
      Constructs a new game state with default values.

  • Methodendetails

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the game state for a new game (start button). All attributes are set/reset, and the controller adjusts them accordingly.

    • setAIPlayers

      public void setAIPlayers()
      Sets up the three computer players for the game.

    • setHumanPlayer

      public void setHumanPlayer(String humanPlayerName)
      Creates a human player with the specified name.
      Parameter:
      humanPlayerName - name of the human player.

    • setSimulationAI

      public void setSimulationAI()
      Sets the fourth player as an AI player, used in simulation mode.

    • getHumanPlayerName

      public String getHumanPlayerName()
      Gets the name of the human player if one exists.
      Gibt zurück:
      The name of the human player or a message indicating that there is no human player in the game.

    • createDeck

      public void createDeck(boolean isStandardDeck)
      Creates the deck.

    • shuffleDeck

      public void shuffleDeck()
      Shuffles the deck.

    • handOutCards

      public void handOutCards()
      Deals cards to players, with each player receiving 13 (for a deck size of 52) or 8 (for a deck size of 32) cards.

    • resetHandCardsOfPlayers

      public void resetHandCardsOfPlayers()
      Resets the hand cards of all players, removing all cards from their hands.

    • getStarterOfRound

      public Player getStarterOfRound() throws IllegalStateException
      Gets the starting player at the beginning of a round.
      Gibt zurück:
      The player who starts the round.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalStateException - If no player has the required starting card on hand.

    • initTrick

      public void initTrick(int startingPlayer)
      Initializes a new trick for the current round.
      Parameter:
      startingPlayer - The player number who starts the trick.

    • addCardToNewestTrick

      public void addCardToNewestTrick(int cardId, int playerNo)
      Adds a card to the current trick.
      Parameter:
      cardId - The identifier of the card to be added.
      playerNo - The player number adding the card to the trick.

    • createAndSetNewRoundTricks

      public Trick[] createAndSetNewRoundTricks()
      Creates a new array of round tricks with a size of 13.
      Gibt zurück:
      The created round tricks array.

    • addRoundTricksToGameRoundTricks

      public void addRoundTricksToGameRoundTricks(Trick[] roundTricks)

    • isFirstTrick

      public boolean isFirstTrick()
      Checks if the current trick is the first trick.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if it is the first trick; otherwise, false.

    • removeCardFromHandCards

      public void removeCardFromHandCards(int cardId, int playerNo)
      Removes a card from the hand cards of a player.
      Parameter:
      cardId - The identifier of the card to be removed.
      playerNo - The player number whose hand cards are being modified.

    • determineTrickWinner

      public Player determineTrickWinner()
      Determines the winner of the current trick.
      Gibt zurück:
      The player who won the trick.

    • updateRoundPoints

      public void updateRoundPoints(Player trickWinner)
      Updates the round points for the trick winner when a trick is completed.
      Parameter:
      trickWinner - The player who won the trick.

    • atLeastOnePlayerHas100PointsOrMore

      public boolean atLeastOnePlayerHas100PointsOrMore()
      Determines whether at least one player has 100 points or more.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if at least one player has 100 points or more; otherwise, false.

    • isRoundOver

      public boolean isRoundOver()
      Checks if the current round is over.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the round is over; otherwise, false.

    • updateGamePoints

      public void updateGamePoints()
      Updates the game points at the end of a round.

      Parameter:

      Gibt zurück:
